roleset.name: adapt in advance
roleset.note: ADAPT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls adjust-26.9. (from adapt.01-v)
ADAPTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from adaption.01-n)

example.name: preadapt-v
example.text: Both cases have the essential feature in common: that [an existing structure]-1 is preadapted *trace*-1 to assume a new function without interference with the original function.
example.arg: to assume a new function without interference with the original function

example.name: preadaptation-n
example.text: Preadaptation from this function to linguistic communication clearly occurred and may have driven the restructuring of the human SVT to optimize the process.
